sentences.en: a highly trained workforce
sentences.cn: 训练有素的劳动力

sentences.en: an investigation is in train.
sentences.cn: 调查正在进行中。

sentences.en: Businesses need to train their workers better, and spend more on R&D.
sentences.cn: 各企业需要更好地培训工人，并且在研发方面加大投入。

sentences.en: He caught an eastbound train to Tottenham Court Road.
sentences.cn: 他搭上了开往托特纳姆宫路的东向地铁列车。

sentences.en: He had a taxi waiting to take him to the train.
sentences.cn: 他让一辆出租车等着带他到火车站去。

sentences.en: He lost a foot when he was struck by a train.
sentences.cn: 他给火车撞伤，失去了一只脚。

sentences.en: He lost his train of thought for a moment, then recovered it.
sentences.cn: 他一时思维短路，然后又重新想了起来。

sentences.en: He rode on the president's luxury train through his own state.
sentences.cn: 他乘坐总统的豪华列车经过自己所在的州。

sentences.en: I failed to follow his train of thought.
sentences.cn: 我没能跟上他的思路。

sentences.en: In 1941, the train would have been pulled by a steam engine.
sentences.cn: 1941年，火车本可以由蒸汽机车拉动。

sentences.en: Red, white and blue bunting hung in the city's renovated train station.
sentences.cn: 红、白、蓝彩旗装点着该市修复一新的火车站。

sentences.en: She threatened to throw herself in front of a train.
sentences.cn: 她威胁要卧轨。

sentences.en: She took the train to New York every weekend.
sentences.cn: 她每个周末乘火车去纽约。

sentences.en: Station staff announced the arrival of the train over the tannoy.
sentences.cn: 车站工作人员通过广播告知火车到站了。

sentences.en: The domino effect if one train is cancelled is enormous.
sentences.cn: 如果一班火车被取消，其连锁反应将是巨大的。

sentences.en: The train backed out of Adelaide Yard on to the Dublin-Belfast line.
sentences.cn: 火车倒出了阿德莱德调车场，开上了都柏林-贝尔法斯特线。

sentences.en: The train was moving now at a snail's pace.
sentences.cn: 火车这会儿走得跟蜗牛一样慢。

sentences.en: The train's average speed was no better than that of our bicycles.
sentences.cn: 火车的平均速度比我们骑自行车的速度快不了多少。

sentences.en: Trained staff will be available to deal with your queries.
sentences.cn: 我们会有受过培训的员工来解答你的问题。

sentences.en: We went all the way to Inverness by train.
sentences.cn: 我们一路坐火车到因弗内斯。

words.tran_cn: 培训；训练过的，受过培训的
练习生，实习生；受训者；新兵；训练中的动物
助理教练；训练员；驯马师；飞行练习器

phrases.phrase: in someone/thing's train (或 in the train of)

phrases.tran_cn: 客运列车，旅客列车；客车

trans.tran_cn: 火车，行列，一系列相关的事情， 拖裾
trans.tran_en: a set of several carriages that are connected to each other and pulled along a railway line by an engine
a set of several carriages that are connected to each other and pulled along a railway line by an engine
to teach someone the skills of a particular job or activity, or to be taught these skills
